title: Traditional Medicinals - Organic Everyday Detox: Dandelion Tea, 16 bags
author: Name
description: Herbal Power: This detox tea stimulates the liver and supports healthy kidney function.* Taste: Slightly sweet with notes of peppermint. Plant Story: Herbalists have celebrated dandelion for thousands of years for its ability to aid the body's natural detoxification processes, particularly the kidneys. Using some of our favorite dandelion from the wild meadows of Southern and Eastern Europe, we created this EveryDay Detox tea to help your body reset and refresh.*
